s: OKIOCAM is the first USB camera designed exclusively for education. A perfect tool for remote and hybrid teaching and learning. OKIOCAM works seamlessly with many popular learning platforms, including Google G Suite for Education, Google Classroom, Microsoft Teams, Flipgrid, Skype, etc.

The OKIOLABS webcam is a professional 4K webcam capable of displaying four times more pixels than a 1080p screen. It intelligently follows your movement by panning the camera side to side, and zooming in and out. The clear ultrawide vision allows you to fit multiple participants in the frame.
